---
title: "example chunk options"
author: "Alex Knudson"
date: "5/14/2021"
output: html_document
chunknames:
  combo:
    prefix: "020"
    extra: ["data/my_list1.rda", "data/my_list2.rda"]
    pattern:
      - adjective
      - color
      - animal
      - my_list1
    sep: "-"
    case: lower
  random:
    prefix: no
    type: "hex/alpha/alphanumeric"
    length: 12
    case: "lower"
  regex:
    pattern: "myprefix-[A-Za-z]{1, 2}[a-f0-9]{6}"
  regex2:
    prefix: "myprefix"
    sep: "-"
    patterns:
      - "[A-Za-z]{1,2}"
      - "string_literal"
      - "[a-f0-9]{6}"
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```
